name: Tsukihime Remake
description: As a child, Shiki Tono had a near-death experience in an accident, but miraculously survived. After the accident, he began to see strange lines on objects and living things, and, moreover, if he could effortlessly cut through anything with a sharp object along those lines. But a side effect was chronic anemia, and frequent loss of consciousness. In addition, Shiki was forced to see these lines all the time. But a once-meeting girl magician gives the boy glasses that allow him to live a normal life. Shiki"s father sends him to foster care. Eight years later, he dies, and Shiki receives a letter ordering him to return home to the Tono family. There, a past he has forgotten awaits him. Back home, the boy is gradually pulled into a new life with his two twin maids, Hisui and Kohaku, and his younger sister, Akiha, becoming the head of the family. At the new school, Tono gets to know his sampai Ciel and his new classmates. Everything goes fine until one day on his way to school, Shiki meets a blond girl...
